turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Siri! can you order 2 pizza from Pizzahut?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which location do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Main road, next to the cinema please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What kind of pizza do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want 2 pepperoni pizza and 1 cheese pizza with Canadian bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! they don't have Canadian Bacon. Do you want something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Arrgggh... What other toppings do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have spinach, anchovies, bacon, cheese, ground meat, chicken, BBQ meat, ham, and mushroom.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. I want mushroom and bacon please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! so 2 pepperoni pizza and 1 cheese with mushroom and bacon. Is it right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. What dessert do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have cinnabon. Do you want to order it as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, Thank you. I am good. Do they have coke?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, they have it. Do you want me to order it as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Make it 2

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can you repeat my order please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. I got 2 pepperoni pizza, 1 cheese pizza with mushroom and bacon, and 2 bottle of coke. Do you want to use your credit card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes. Please use my visa.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! Your receipt will be sent through text message right away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. How long will it take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The pizza will be ready in 25 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you Siri! That's it for now!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome sir!

items.name: Main road, next to the cinema
